description: Help CPA candidates pass the CPA Exam.  Phone in questions to the host.
title: Phone Phil

episodes.title: Lets Talk CPa Exam
episodes.description:
Updates for Yaeger FAR students --
 Yaeger CPA Review students, with 2012 FAR study materials, can still be prepared for the 2013 exams, if you listen carefully to Cindy and Phil do their review of each FAR module.  They will go over what has "no changes" to "major, must know, changes".  You don't need all new material, but you do need these UPDATES.
This show will be archived, so make sure you listen to it before taking your next exam.

episodes.title: Lets Talk CPA Exam
episodes.description: Phil Yaeger, of Yaeger CPA Review, will discuss "must know" changes in the American Tax Relief Act for 2013, effective July 2013.All are invited to call in or email with questions to sonny@yaegercpareview.com

episodes.title: Lets Talk CPA Exam
episodes.description:
NASBA "Take 2".
This is a Follow-Up to our March 6th show with NASBA.
Phil Yaeger will host an educational show featuring special guests from the National Association of State Boards of Accountancy (NASBA).
Questions will be answered by representatives from NASBA's Accounting Licensing Library and CPAES departments.
 They will be taking phone calls to address your questions and concerns when preparing for the CPA exam.

episodes.title: Lets Talk CPA Exam
episodes.description:
Phil Yaeger will host a educational show on How to Boost Your Test Performance on the CPA Exam.
 Featuring special guest Marc Schoen, Ph.D.

 Marc Schoen is the Assistant Clinical Professor of Medicine at UCLA and Author of Why Your Survival Instinct is Killing You.
 Topics covered:
 Physiology of High Performance and Strengthening Problem and Decision Making Under Pressure.
 Managing Pressure Related Discomfort , Techniques to Improve Knowledge and Retention Methods to Enhance Test Performance and De-stressing Tools.
 Marc will be answering questions on ways to improve your psychic.

episodes.title: Let's Talk CPA Exam
episodes.description:
Phil Yaeger will host an educational show featuring special guests from the National Association of State Boards of Accountancy (NASBA).
 Questions will be answered by representatives from NASBA's Accounting Licensing Library and CPAES departments.
 They will be taking phone calls to address your questions and concerns when preparing for the CPA exam.

episodes.title: Let's Talk CPA Exam
episodes.description: Phil Yaeger, of Yaeger CPA Review, will discuss frequently asked questions. He will be joined by Sonny Cox and John Pelicano. Together they will discuss concerns about taking, and studying for, the CPA exam. They will each bring their unique perspective into their responses. As always, call-ins are welcome.

episodes.title: Let's Talk CPA Exam
episodes.description: Phil Yaeger, of Yaeger CPA Review, will discuss typical questions often asked by CPA candidates. He will be joined by Sonny Cox and John Pelicano, both part of the Yaeger Team. Together they will discuss frequently asked questions and concerns about taking, and studying for, the CPA exam. They will each bring their unique perspective into their responses. As always, call-ins are welcome.

episodes.title: Let's Talk CPA Exam
episodes.description: Cindy Simpson, of Yaeger CPA Review, will discuss "tips and tricks" for the BEC part of the CPA Exam.  This will be a great review for 4th quarter 2012 CPA Exam candidates.  All are invited to call in with questions about the upcoming exams.

episodes.title: Let's Talk CPA Exam
episodes.description:
Phil Yaeger, of Yaeger CPA Review, will continue his discussion of "must know" CPA exam topics for Financial Accounting and Reporting. 
 Due to the high number of archived listeners of last week's show, Phil has decided to do a continuation of FAR, as he suggested he would during the last show.
 As always, call-ins are welcome.

episodes.title: Let's Talk CPA Exam
episodes.description:
Phil Yaeger, of Yaeger CPA Review, will discuss "must know" concepts in Financial Accounting & Reporting. 
 Great review for 4th quarter 2012 CPA Exam candidates. 
 All are invited to call in with questions or concerns about the upcoming exams.

episodes.title: Let's Talk CPA Exam
episodes.description:
FAR part of the CPA Exam
Phil Yaeger and Cindy Simpson, of Yaeger CPA Review, will talk about several concepts on FAR that candidates find troubleome.
Listeners are invited to call in with question to discuss.

episodes.title: Let's Talk CPA Exam
episodes.description:
FAR part of the CPA Exam
Phil Yaeger and Cindy Simpson, of Yaeger CPA Review, will talk about several areas in FAR that candidates find troublesome. Listeners are invited to call in with questions to discuss.

episodes.title: Let's Talk CPA Exam
episodes.description:
REG part of the CPA Exam
Phil Yaeger, of Yaeger CPA Review, will talk about several areas in REG that candidates find troublesome. Listeners are invited to call in with questions to discuss.

episodes.title: Let's Talk CPA Exam
episodes.description:
Phil Yaeger and Cindy Simpson, of Yaeger CPA Review, will discuss important topics that would make for good test questions on the Financial Accounting part of the CPA Exam.
 They will also cover updates candidates should know for FAR exams in 2012.  Candidates are welcome to call-in with their questions.  There will be great give-aways to many callers.

episodes.title: Let's Talk CPA Exam
episodes.description:
Phil Yaeger, of Yaeger CPA Review, will discuss important topics in Taxation that he thinks would make for good test questions.  In addition, he will go over updates candidates need to know for the 2012 Regulations exams.
 Candidates are welcome to call-in with their questions.  There will be several give-aways for many who call-in.

episodes.title: Let's Talk CPA Exam
episodes.description:
Final Call -- last minute review for FAR and REG, with Phil Yaeger.  After spending the last few weeks talking with, and encouraging students, just before their upcoming FAR and/or REG exams, he has decided to do one more show reviewing what you need to know for FAR and REG. 
 This will be your last chance to call him directly with your "pre-panic" FAR and/or REG questions.  Don't miss out. 
 P.S.  Several students recently told him that by listening to one of his past shows, and the advice he gave, made a huge difference in their exam performance.

episodes.title: Let's Talk CPA Exam
episodes.description:
Phil Yaeger and Gary Bulmash of Yaeger CPA Review will discuss the Auditing portion of the CPA Exam. 
 Gary has been teaching CPA Review for 35+ years (he and Phil are part of the "old timers" of CPA Review).  He taught full time at The American University in Washington, DC and currently teaches full time at the University of Maryland.  He has been teaching for Yaeger CPA Review for close to 25 years.
 In a sentence, Gary knows Auditing.  Candidates who take the time to listen to what he has to say, pass the Auditing exam.  The key is, you need to listen to what he says -- chances are, you will see it on the exam! 
 This week Phil and Gary will discuss study strategies for passing  the Auditing part of the exam --  what's most important to know, how to recognize the "best" answer, how to approach answering the simulation questions as well as the mcq, and other helpful nuggets of information.  Auditing candidates, this is your chance to talk directly with Gary and get answers to your Auditing concerns.

episodes.title: Let's Talk CPA Exam
episodes.description:
Working and Studying:  How to Keep Your Sanity and Pass
 Phil Yaeger, of Yaeger CPA Review, and his guest, Caleb Newquist, will discuss the art of balancing Work and Study time.  
Caleb, is the founding editor of Going Concern, an Online Tabloid for Modern Accounting & Finance Professionals.He teaches at the Community College of Denver.
 Caleb passed the CPA exam - all four parts at once! - back in the stone age when candidates took the exam with paper and pencil. Caleb worked in public accounting for 5.5 years including over 3 at KPMG.  He lives in Denver, Colorado.

episodes.title: Let's Talk CPA Exam
episodes.description:
RE-SCHEDULED from last week ................
 Phil Yaeger and Cindy Simpson, of Yaeger CPA Review, will discuss the Regulation and BEC parts of the CPA Exam.  Many candidates seem to be discouraged while studying for these parts.   Phil and Cindy will go over some ways to best prepare for these parts.  Candidates studying now for Regulation or BEC are encouraged to call in with "How to Study" questions.

episodes.title: Let's Talk CPA Exam
episodes.description:
Quiz Show continued !!
 Last week's (first) Quiz Show had some technical difficulties.  So Phil wants to do again this Thursday.  Same subjects -- FAR and REG --.  Answer the quiz questions and win Yaeger CPA Review Listen-n-Learn audio lectures.  A GREAT way to do last minute reviewing.

episodes.title: Let's Talk CPA Exam
episodes.description:
This week is two parts in one ...
 First half hour Phil will talk about last minute CPA Exam strategies.  What you should do during your final days/weeks of studying. How to make the best use of your study time before the big day.  Listeners are invited to call-in with their specific concerns about studying and/or their own last minute advice.
 Second half hour will be our first ever CPA Exam GAME SHOW.  Phil will throw out questions in FAR and REG and callers need to call-in with the correct answers to win prizes.

episodes.title: Let's Talk CPA Exam
episodes.description: This week,  Phil Yaeger and Cindy Simpson will discuss why so many candidates seem to have so much trouble passing the FAR and BEC sections of the exam.  Phil and Cindy split the teaching of FAR, and Cindy teaches all of the BEC.  Plan to join in on this discussion.

episodes.title: Let's Talk CPA Exam
episodes.description: This week, Phil's guest is Ray Whittington, CPA, PhD, author of the Wiley CPA Review textbooks.  Ray aand Phil will discuss all of the new material to be tested on the CPA Exams as of July 1, 2011.  Don't miss this critically important show.

episodes.title: Let's Talk CPA Exam
episodes.description:
Next episode, Phil's guest will be Marc Schoen, Ph.D., from UCLA School of Medicine.  Dr. Schoen has titled his mini lecture --
Pass Your Next CPA Exam by Boosting Your Test Performance Skills
 Dr. Schoen's clinical and research specialty is in the area of boosting test performance.  His Test Performance Training programs have helped improve test scores for students studying for exams, such as the Bar Exam, as well as the SAT exams.  He and Phil will discuss these techniques specifically as they would pertain to the CPA Exam.  Don't miss this opportunity to learn more about increasing your exam scores.

episodes.title: Let's Talk CPA Exam
episodes.description: This week Phil will talk with previous students who will share their own personal experiences studying with Yaeger CPA Review, as well as their actual exam experience.  Listeners are strongly urged to call in and ask fellow candidates what they did to successfully PASS their exams.

episodes.title: Let's Talk CPA Exam
episodes.description: Phil Yaeger, of Yaeger CPA Review, returns Wednesday night at 10 p.m. Eastern time to continue his discussion about updates for the 2011 Regulation exam.  Candidates are encouraged to call-in and talk with Phil about their  preparation for the Regulation exam.

episodes.title: Let's Talk CPA Exam
episodes.description: CPA candidates can call in and talk live with Phil Yaeger of Yaeger CPA Review.  This week the topic is REGULATION.  Please call-in for advice with your REG questions.

episodes.title: Let's Talk CPA Exam
episodes.description: CPA candidates can email or call-in questions about parts of the CPA exam, and talk directly with Phil Yaeger or Cindy Simpson of Yaeger CPA Review.  This first show will be limited to questions about REG and most of FAR.
